text:
7. Static vs. Dynamic : Do you require a static or a dynamically updated model?
8. Contiguous vs. Discontiguous : Are your observations contiguous or discontiguous?
2.11 Extensions
This section lists some ideas for extending the tutorial that you may wish to explore.
 Apply Taxonomy. Select a standard time series dataset and work through the questions
in the taxonomy to learn more about the dataset.
 Standard Form. Transform the taxonomy into a form or spreadsheet that you can re-use
